dialogue.speaker: Naomi
dialogue.text: Please tell me the answer, Janette!

dialogue.speaker: Janette
dialogue.text: You have to figure it out yourself, Naomi! I won't be with you at the exam!

dialogue.speaker: Naomi
dialogue.text: Come on, Janette!

dialogue.speaker: Janette
dialogue.text: A no is a no.

dialogue.speaker: Naomi
dialogue.text: I have an Idea...

dialogue.speaker: Naomi
dialogue.text: Hey <username>!

dialogue.speaker: Naomi
dialogue.text: This question is too hard. Can you help me wi--

dialogue.speaker: Ms.&Nora
dialogue.text:
Ok students, this class has ended, do not forget to do the assignment for next week.
 Have a nice week end.

dialogue.speaker: Naomi
dialogue.text: Hey Miss! Can I join <username> and Elise for today's extra classes? I don't feel well about this chapter...

dialogue.speaker: Ms.&Nora
dialogue.text: Yes of course, we will meet in the library in half an hour.

dialogue.speaker: Naomi
dialogue.text: Thank you Miss!

dialogue.speaker: Naomi
dialogue.text: I'll see you then~ <username>!

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: You go to the library after today's class.

dialogue.speaker: <username>
dialogue.text: Hi girls! Isn't Ms. Nora here yet?

dialogue.speaker: Elise
dialogue.text: No, she's not, she said we had to start without her, she'll be late.

dialogue.speaker: <username>
dialogue.text: Oh, okay.

dialogue.speaker: Elise
dialogue.text: Hey, <username>, can I talk to you in private?

dialogue.speaker: Elise
dialogue.text: Ok, we're good now. Do you remember the forbidden book you wanted to get your hands on?

dialogue.speaker: <username>
dialogue.text: The one about Nova summoning? Yes, I remember it very well.

dialogue.speaker: Elise
dialogue.text: Well, the book is in the library right now. Do you want to take a look?

dialogue.speaker: <username>
dialogue.text: You mean, in the forbidden section?

dialogue.speaker: Elise
dialogue.text: Yes, of course, but the guardian fell asleep on his desk. It is now or never.

dialogue.speaker: <username>
dialogue.text: Okay, I'll try to be quick.

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: You go to the forbidden section of the library.

dialogue.speaker: <username>
dialogue.text: Where is it?

dialogue.speaker: <username>
dialogue.text: Here!

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: You open the book, with the enthusiasm of a child opening a present.

dialogue.speaker: <username>
dialogue.text: The art of summoning!

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: You look around quickly, no one is here.

dialogue.speaker: <username>
dialogue.text: Hmm... Let's try something simple first.

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: As you read outloud the first page of the book, you notice something isn't right. But you continue reading anyways

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: The more you read, the more the book seems to glow.

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: But before you have time to finish the sentence, the light envelops your whole field of vision.

dialogue.speaker: <username>
dialogue.text: Wait, wh--

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: When the light starts to fade, you notice you are not at the library anymore.

dialogue.speaker: <username>
dialogue.text: What happened?
Hum... Hello?
